price: (Nkͻmhyεni), kae sε wopue gyaa w’abusuafoͻ hͻ anͻpa tutuutu (kͻͻ Uhud) akono hͻ kͻhyehyεε faako a agyidiefoͻ no begyina ako. Na Nyankopͻn deε Ɔte biribiara, na Ɔne Onimdefoͻ.
arabic: وَإِذۡ غَدَوۡتَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مَقَٰعِدَ لِلۡقِتَالِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ghadawta min ahlika tubawwi-u al-mu'minīna maqāʿida lil'qitāli wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
